syllabus:
Course Description 

According to the United Nations World Tourism Organization (UNWTO), tourism ranks among the fastest growing industries in the world. This ESP course aims to help students develop their understanding of the tourism industry. Topics include travel agency and reservation, transport types, accommodations, vacation packages, SWOT analysis in marketing, and careers in tourism. The course provides authentic materials to strengthen student’s communication skill in a professional context, as well as the ability to interpret charts, tables, and forms. The course aims to meet these objectives through lectures, readings, assignments, and collaborative activities.

Required Texts    

Robin Walker & Keith Harding. Oxford English for Careers: Tourism1. Oxford University Press

Course Requirements 

1.  Midterm (25%) and Final (25%)    

       2. Assignments (30%)  

       3. Participation & In-class Activities (20%)
